tuv.seg: It is a legal requirement to have motor insurance if you want to drive your car in a public place and you must produce a current Certificate of Insurance to pay motor tax
Tá dualgas dleathúil ort cáin mhótair a íoc más mian leat do charr a thiomáint in áit phoiblí agus ní mór duit Teastas Árachais reatha a thaispeáint le cáin mhótair a íoc
Motor insurance is about protecting other road users as opposed to the driver of the insured vehicle and it is not an optional extra
Ní cosaint tiománaí an chairr atá faoi árachas atá i gceist le hárachas móthair ach daoine eile ar an mbóthar a chosaint agus níl aon rogha ann ach árachas a íoc
Insurance companies provide motor insurance and unlike road tax, there is no such thing as a "standard" rate
Comhlachtaí árachais a chuireann árachas mótair ar fáil agus níl aon ráta "caighdeánach" ann fé mar atá le cáin mhótair
Traditionally, gender has been one of the factors that insurance companies consider when calculating risk
Go traidisiúnta, tá inscne ar cheann de na fachtóirí a mheas cuideachtaí árachais nuair a ríomh riosca
Arising from a ruling on a case brought before the European Court of Justice, since 21 December 2012 insurance companies can no longer quote a different price for motor insurance based on gender

Ag éirí as rialú ar chás os comhair na Cúirte Breithiúnais Eorpaí, ó 21 December 2012 ní féidir le cuideachtaí árachais a thuilleadh ceanglófar ar phraghas éagsúla le haghaidh árachas mótair bunaithe ar inscne
Further information on the introduction of unisex insurance (pdf) is available on the Department of Justice and Equality's website
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar thabhairt isteach unisex árachais (pdf) ar fáil ar an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais ar láithreán gréasáin
Young drivers represent a high risk for insurers and the cost of motor insurance in this age group is considerably higher than for others both in Ireland and throughout the European Union (EU)

Tá contúirt níos mó ag baint le tiománaithe óga de réir na gcomhlachtaí árachais agus mar sin in Éirinn agus ar fud an Chomhpobail Eorpaigh (CE) cosnaíonn árachais mótair don aois ghrúpa seo i bhfad níos mó ná do dhaoine eile
There are a number of things young drivers can do to reduce the cost of motor insurance:
Tá roinnt rudaí gur féidir le tiománaithe óga a dhéanamh le costas árachas mótair a choinneáil íseal:
• Join a parent's insurance as a named driver as early as possible
• Cuir d'ainm ar pholasaí do thuismitheoirí mar thiománaí ainmnithe chomh luath agus is féidir
This will enable you to establish a safety record, which is crucial when you want to apply for insurance in your own name
Beidh cuntas sábháilteachas agat, rud a bheidh fíorthábhachtach duit nuair a bhíonn árachas i d'ainm féin dhá sholáthar agat
Some companies offer discounts to young people seeking insurance in their own name if they have been a named driver
Cuireann comhlachtaí faoi leith lascainí ar fáil do dhaoine óga a bhfuil árachas ina n-ainm féin uathu má bhíodar ainmnithe ar pholasaí eile
• Get a full licence as soon as possible
• Faigh ceadúnas iomlán chomh luath agus is féidir leat
Having a full licence will reduce the cost of your insurance premium considerably
Beidh costas i bhfad níos lú ar an árachas má bhíonn ceadúnas iomlán agat
Savings vary, but it is possible for a young driver to save a vast amount on the cost of his or her insurance premium simply by having a full driving licence
Braitheann sé ó chomhlacht go comhlacht ach, d'fhéadfadh tiománaí óg suas le 900 euro (agus níos mó amanta) a shábháil ar chostas a (h)árachas díreach má bhíonn ceadúnas iomlán tiomána aige/aici
• Choose a car with a relatively small engine, as less powerful cars are cheaper to insure
• Pioc carr le hinneall beag, cosnaíonn sé níos lú carranna le hinnill bheaga a chlúdach le hárachas
The best way to reduce the cost of your motor insurance is to build up your no claims bonus
An bealach is fearr le costas an árachais a choinneáil íseal an bónas glan ó éileamh a mhéadú
Motor insurance and the Equal Status Act
Árachas mótair agus an tAcht um Stádas Comhionann
Section 5(2) of the Equal Status Act, 2000, as amended, allows differential treatment in relation to the calculation of insurance policies in Ireland
Foráiltear le hAlt 5(2) den Acht um Stádas Comhionann, 2000, gur féidir polasaithe árachais a ríomh ar bhealaí éagsúil in Éirinn
This means, that insurance companies are allowed to charge higher or lower rates for policies on the basis of your potential risk as a driver
Fágann sé sin gur féidir le cuideachtaí árachais rátaí níos airde nó níos ísle a ghearradh ar pholasaithe bunaithe ar an riosca a d’fhéadfadh bheith ag gabháil leat mar thiománaí
Given that younger drivers in Ireland are statistically more likely to have accidents, this explains why there can be sizeable differences in insurance costs between younger and older drivers

Toisc go mbíonn sé níos dóchúla de réir staitisticí go mbeidh timpiste ag tiománaí óg ná tiománaí sean, bíonn difríochtaí suntasacha idir na costais árachais a ghearrtar ar thiománaithe óga agus ar thiománaithe seana
Types of motor insurance policy
Cineálacha polasaí árachais mótair
The most basic insurance is "third party" and this is the minimum required by law
"Árachas don tríú duine" an bunárachas atá ar fáil agus teastaíonn seo de réir an dlí
However, third party is only one of three main categories
Ach, níl in árachas don tríú duine ach rannóg amháin de thrí phríomh rannóg

This is the most expensive type of insurance on the market and covers you for almost every eventuality: any damage done to the vehicle regardless of how it was incurred; life/accident insurance; loss of personal belongings from the car; the cost of a hired car if the insured car is off the road as a result of an accident; windscreen breakage, etc

Is é seo an cinéal árachais is costasaí atá ar fáil agus tá clúdach ar fáil ann ar son beagnach chuile rud gur féidir a thitim amach: damáiste don fheithicíl is cuma cén chaoi ar tharla sé; árachas saoil/timpiste; maoin phearsanta a bheith tógtha ón gcarr; costas a bhaineann le carr eile a fháil ar chíos má bhíonn an carr atá faoi árachas imithe den bhóthar de bharr timpiste; gaothscáth a bheith briste, srl
With more brand new cars on the road than ever before, there has been a notable rise in people taking out comprehensive insurance
Tá ardú suntasach ar an méid daoine a bhfuil árachas cuimsitheach acu ós rud é go bhfuil i bhfad níos mó carranna nua ar an mbóthar anois
A brand new car should be comprehensively insured
Ba cheart árachas cuimsitheach a íoc ar son cairr nua
Third party, fire and theft
Árachas tríú duine, tine agus goid
This is the most popular form of motor insurance in Ireland
Is é seo an cineál árachais is coitianta in Éirinn
It covers you for loss of the vehicle through fire or theft and for any loss as a result of attempted fire or theft
Clúdaíonn sé thú má chailleann tú an carr tré thine nó má ghoidtear é agus ar son aon chaillteanas a bhaineann le hiarracht é a lasadh nó a ghoid
Damage to property is also covered
Tá damáiste maoine clúdaithe freisin
There are also optional extras available such as windscreen breakage
Is féidir rudaí breise roghnacha a íoc freisin ar nós árachais ar an ngaothscáth
This is the minimum cover required by law, but it does have restrictions and limits, leaving you open to substantial loss in the event of an accident
Tá an t-árachas seo ar an laghad ag teastáil de réir dlí, ach tá teorainneacha ag baint leis a fhágann go bhféadfadh sé go mbeadh tú thíos go mór dá mbeadh timpiste ann
If you are at fault, then only your passengers and the driver and passengers of the other vehicle will be compensated
Má tá an locht ort féin sa timpiste tá cúiteamh ar fáil do na paisinéirí i do charr agus do thiománaí agus paisinéirí an chairr eile
This type of insurance provides no cover for damage sustained in an accident to your car or if your car is stolen or goes on fire
Níl aon clúdach ar fáil leis an gcineál seo árachais do dhamáiste a d'fhéadfaí déanamh do do charr féin i dtimpiste nó má ghoidtear do charr nó má lasann sé
An insurance company considers many things when calculating an insurance premium
Cuireann comhlacht árachais go leor rudaí san áireamh nuair atá costas árachais dhá mheas
Most premiums are based on basic third party cover with the cost of extras added on
Bíonn polasaithe bunaithe ar bhunchlúdach don tríú duine le costas na rudaí breise curtha leis
The main thing that will determine the cost of your insurance is what you actually want to be covered for
An clúdach a theastaíonn uait féin a dhéanann costas an árachais a mheas
The following are always taken into account:
Cuirtear na rudaí seo a leanas san áireamh i gcónaí:
Whether you are driving on a full or provisional licence makes a huge difference to the cost of your motor insurance premium
Tá tionchar mór ar chostas an árachais má bhíonn tú ag tiomáint le ceadúnas sealadach seachas ceadúnas iomlán
You can expect to pay hundreds of euro extra, if you only have a provisional licence
Bíonn na céadta punt breise le n-íoc más ceadúnas sealadach atá agat
Size and age of car
Méid agus aois an chairr
The engine capacity and age of the car play a large part in determining the cost of your premium
Tá baint mhór ag cumhacht an innill agus a aois le costas an árachais
The older the car, the more difficult it can be to insure
Bíonn sé níos deacra seancharranna a chlúdach faoi árachas
Many insurance companies believe that the older a car is, the more accident-prone it becomes
Creideann go leor comhlachtaí árachais go bhfuil i bhfad níos mó seans ann go mbeidh timpiste ag carr atá sean
A new car is more expensive to replace than an old car and will cost more to insure
Cosnaíonn sé i bhfad níos mó carr eile a fháil in áit chairr nua agus beidh sé níos costasaí árachas a fháil air
Likewise, the more powerful the car you drive, the more it will cost to insure
Chomh maith leis sin beidh sé níos costasaí carranna móra a chlúdach faoi árachas
The young and the old represent high-risk categories and pay more for insurance
Tá níos mó seans ann go mbeidh timpiste ag daoine óga agus ag seandaoine agus mar sin íocann siad níos mó árachais
The value of a car is taken into account for third party, fire and theft and for comprehensive insurance
Cuirtear luach an chairr san áireamh ar son polasaithe don tríú duine, tine agus goid agus árachas cuimsitheach
What you have the car insured for, however, is not always what the insurance company will pay out in the event of a claim
Ní ionann i gcónaí an méid atá luaite agat sa pholasaí mar luach ar an gcarr agus an méid a íocfaidh an comhlacht árachais i gcás éilimh
In the event of the car being a write-off, the insurance company will only pay out what it feels the car is worth, which, more often than not, is less than the car is actually insured for

Sa chás go mbíonn an carr go hiomlán gan aon mhaith, íocfaidh an comhlacht árachais an luach a chreideann sé a bheith ar an gcarr, rud a bhíonn, níos minicí ná a mhalairt, níos lú ná an luach a bhí sa pholasaí
There is very little to gain by over-insuring a car and, equally, you should not under-insure it either
Níl mórán le baint amach agat má chuireann tú luach ró-ard ar an gcarr agus mar an gceanna luach ró-íseal
All insurance companies will ask if you have ever had insurance in your own name before
Beidh na comhlachtaí árachais ar fad ag iarraidh fáil amach an raibh árachas i d'ainm féin ariamh agat
If not, they will ask if you have ever driven under someone else's insurance without incident
Muna raibh, beidh siad ag iarraidh fáil amach an raibh tú ainmnithe faoi árachas aon duine eile gan aon eachtra
This will be taken into account when calculating a premium
Cuirfear seo san áireamh nuair atá costas an pholasaí dhá mheas
Insurance becomes less expensive with experience and a clean driving record
Tagann costas an árachais anuas de réir mar a bhíonn taithí faighte ag duine agus ceadúnas glan iomlán
Some professions are considered to be more at risk than others and will have a loading put onto their premium
Creidtear go bhfuil níos mó dáinséir ag baint le gairmeacha faoi leith seachas cuid eile agus beidh costas níos airde ar an bpolasaí dá bharr
What the car will actually be used for is also taken into account
Cuirtear san áireamh freisin an úsáid a bhainfear as an gcarr
A standard policy covers the vehicle for social, domestic and pleasure purposes, but not for the carriage of goods
Clúdaíonn gnáthpholasaí an feithicíl ar mhaithe le húsáid sóisialta, teaghlaigh agus pléisiúir ach ní féidir lastas a iompar faoin gcineál polasaí seo
If the car is being used for business, then a loading will apply
Má tá úsáid ghnó dhá bhaint as an gcarr beidh costas níos airde le n-íoc ar an árachas
If the car is being used commercially, then an even higher loading will be imposed
Más úsáid tráchtála atá i gceist beidh costas níos airde arís ar an árachas
Where the car is kept
Cá mbíonn an carr coinnithe
Those living in a major city, particularly Dublin, will normally have a loading imposed
Is iondúil go mbeidh costas níos airde orthu siúd a chónaíonn i gcatharacha móra, Baile Átha Cliath go háirid
Some companies will also impose a loading if the car is not kept in a garage at night
Beidh comhlachtaí faoi leith ag iarraidh costais níos airde a bhaint amach muna bhfuil an carr coinnithe i ngaráiste san oíche
Most insurance policies contain some type of an excess clause
Beidh clása farasbairr de chineál éigin ag an gcuid is mó comhlachtaí árachais
This means that the policyholder is liable for an agreed amount towards the cost (e.g., the first 250 euro)
Beidh ar an duine gur leis an polasaí méid faoi leith aontaithe a íoc ar son an chostais (mar shampla an chéad 200 euro)
The premium will cost more if this clause is taken out
Beidh costas níos airde ar an árachas má fhágtar an clása seo amach

It pays to shop around, because what might be considered an extra in one company (windscreen breakage, car hire in the event of the car being off the road, loss of personal effects, etc.) could be standard in another

Is fiú costas a fhiosrú le go leor comhlachtaí mar d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh costas breise ar rud ag comhlacht amháin (briseadh gaothscátha, carr eile a fháil ar chíos má bhíonn do cheann féin imithe den bhóthar, cailltiúnas maoin phearsanta, & rl) agus an rud céanna a bheith cludaithe faoi bhunpholasaí ag comhlacht eile
A no claims discount (also known as no claims bonus) is built up over the years and gives the policyholder a substantial reduction in the cost of his or her premiums
De réir na mblianta a fhaigheann duine bónas glan ó éileamh agus bíonn laghdú substantúil i gcostas an árachais ar fáil dó/dí
The ceiling for a no claims bonus is usually around 60%, leaving someone who has never had a claim with only 40% to pay
Tuairim is 60% den chostas an t-uasmhéid bónais gur féidir a fháil rud a fhágann an té nár dhéin éileamh ariamh le 40% den ghnáthchostas le n-íoc
In the event of a minor accident, it is sometimes cheaper to pay for any damage out of your own pocket rather than claiming from your insurance and losing your no claims bonus
Más timpiste beag a bhíonn agat, amanta tá sé níos saoire an damáiste a íoc thú féin seachas éileamh a dhéanamh ar chúiteamh ón gcomhlacht árachais agus an bónas glan ó éileamh a chailliúint
If you make a claim and subsequently lose your no claims bonus, you can build it up again in a few years
Má dhéanann tú éileamh agus má chailleann tú an bónas dá bharr is féidir é a chur le chéile arís tar éis cúpla bliain
Some insurance companies will even allow you one claim without it affecting your no claims bonus
Bíonn cuid de na comhlachtaí árachais fiú sásta éileamh amháin a cheadú roimh a dhéanann sé aon difríocht don bhónas glan ó éileamh
If you have no insurance in your own name for 2 or more years, many insurers will not give you your no claims discount when you reapply for insurance cover
Má tá aon árachais i d'ainm féin ar feadh 2 bhliain nó níos mó agat, ní bheidh go leor árachóirí a thabhairt duit do aon lascaine éilimh nuair athiarratas tú do chlúdach árachais
You must have motor insurance to drive a car in your own name or as a named driver on someone else's policy
Is gá duit árachas mótair a bheith agat i d’ainm féin nó mar thiománaí ainmnithe ar pholasaí duine eile chun cead a bheith agat carr a thiomáint
Failure to have motor insurance or driving without insurance in Ireland is generally punishable by:
Sa chás nach bhfuil árachas mótair ag duine nó go dtiomáineann duine gan árachas in Éirinn, forchuirtear na pionóis seo a leanas de ghnáth:
• A fine of up to €5,000
• Fíneáil nach mó ná €5,000
• At the discretion of the court, a term of imprisonment not exceeding six months
• Más maith leis an gcúirt é, téarma príosúnachta nach faide ná sé mhí
The court may decide that you be disqualified from driving instead of incurring penalty points
Féadfaidh an chúirt cinneadh tú a dhícháiliú ó thiomáint in ionad pointí pionóis a fhorchur
In that case, you will be disqualified for 2 years or more for a first offence and 4 years or more in the case of a second offence committed within 3 years of the first

Sa chás sin, beidh tú dícháilithe ar feadh 2 bhliain nó níos mó sa chás gurb é sin an chéad chion atá déanta agat ina leith nó beidh tú dícháilithe ar feadh 4 bliana nó níos mó sa chás gurb é an dara cion atá déanta ina leith agus gur tharla sé laistigh de 3 bliana ón gcéad chion

You should note that where a member of An Garda Síochána (Irish police force) believes that a vehicle registered in Ireland (or outside Ireland) is being used in a public place without insurance, the vehicle may be impounded

Sa chás go gcreideann ball den Gharda Síochána (fórsa póilíneachta na hÉireann) go bhfuil feithicil atá cláraithe in Éirinn (nó lasmuigh d’Éirinn) á húsáid in áit phoiblí gan árachas, ba cheart a thabhairt faoi deara go bhféadfar an fheithicil a chur i bpóna
If you are refused motor insurance
Sa chás go ndiúltaítear árachas mótair duit
Individual insurers have the right to refuse you cover, but they must provide you with a reason for the refusal should you ask for one
Tá sé de cheart ag árachóirí aonair diúltú d’árachas a chur ar fáil duit, ach ní mór dóibh cúis leis an diúltú sin a thabhairt duit sa chás go n-iarrann tú í
However, even though you have been refused cover, you are entitled to go to the Declined Cases Committee of Insurance Ireland who will obtain an insurance quotation for you
Fiú amháin gur diúltaíodh clúdach duit, áfach, tá tú i dteideal dul i muinín Choiste Cásanna Diúltaithe Éire Árachas agus gheobhaidh an Coiste luachan árachais ar do shon
In order for the Committee to consider your case you must first have sought and been refused quotations in writing from at least three insurers

D’fhonn gur féidir leis an gCoiste do chás a bhreithniú, ní mór luachan i scríbhinn a bheith iarrtha agat ó thrí árachóir ar a laghad agus ní mór gach ceann de na luachana sin a bheith diúltaithe duit ar dtús
With more companies than ever before competing for business, it is possible to make considerable savings by ringing around for the best quote
Agus níos mó cuideachtaí ná riamh a bheith in iomaíocht le chéile ar son gnó, is féidir coigiltí suntasacha a dhéanamh trí dhul ar lorg na luachana is fearr
Information on the types of motor insurance there are, and the differences between them, is available on the Competition and Consumer Protection Commission's website
Is féidir faisnéis ar na cineálacha árachais mhótair atá ann, agus ar na difríochtaí eatarthu, a fháil ar láithreán Gréasáin na Gníomhaireachta Náisiúnta Tomhaltóirí
It also provides cost comparison information
Tugtar faisnéis comparáide costais ar an suíomh freisin
You can apply for motor insurance over the phone, in person or through a motor insurance broker
Is féidir árachas mótair a lorg ar an bhfón, go pearsanta nó tríd bróicéir árachais mhótair
Motor insurance companies and insurance brokers are listed in your public telephone directory
Tá comhlachtaí árachais mhótair agus bróicéirí árachais le fáil san Eolaí Teileafóin
If you want to drive as a named driver on someone else's policy, then that person must contact their insurance company and arrange to have you insured under their policy
Más mian leat tiomáint mar thiománaí ainmnithe ar pholasaí dhuine eile ní mór don té gur leis/léi an polasaí árachais teagmháil a dhéanamh lena c(h)omhlacht árachais leis na socruithe a dhéanamh

Under Non-Life Insurance (Provision of Information) (Renewal of Policy of Insurance) Regulations 2007 (SI No. 74/2007) your motor insurance company must issue your insurance renewal notice not less than 15 working days before the date of expiry of your insurance policy

Faoi Árachas Neamh-Shaoil ​​(Faisnéis) (Athnuachan Polasaí Árachais) 2007 (IR Uimh 74/2007) ní mór do chuideachta árachais mhótair a eisiúint do fógra athnuachana árachais nach lú ná 15 lá oibre roimh an dáta a dhul in éag do pholasaí árachais
It is also required to include with the notice your no claims discount certificate
Tá sé riachtanach freisin a chur san áireamh de réir an fhógra do aon deimhniú lascaine éilimh
You will need this certificate if you want to renew your motor insurance with a different insurance company
Beidh ort an teastas seo más mian leat a athnuachan do árachais mótair le cuideachta árachais éagsúla
You can find more information on motor insurance on consumerhelp.ie
Is féidir leat breis eolais a fháil ar árachas mótair ar consumerhelp.ie
The Financial Services Ombudsman deals with complaints and disputes between policyholders and their insurance companies when the company's complaints procedure fails to resolve the problem

Déileálann an Ombudsman um Sheirbhísí Airgeadais legearáin agus díospóidí idir sealbhóirí polasaí agus a gcuid comhlachtaí árachais nuair a theipeann ar nós imeachta gearáin an chomhlachta an fhadhb a réiteach
The Financial Services Ombudsman's decision is binding, if you are unsatisfied with the decision you may take your case to the High Court
Tá cinneadh an Ombudsman um Sheirbhísí Airgeadais ceangailteach, má tá tú míshásta leis an gcinneadh is féidir leat do chás a chur chuig an Ard-Chúirt
The Insurance Information Service (IIS) is an information and complaints service operated by the Insurance Ireland, which many insurance companies in Ireland belong to
Is seirbhís um fhaisnéis agus gearáin í an tSeirbhís um Árachas Faisnéise (IIS) atá faoi stiúr ag Éire Árachas, lena mbaineann go leor comhlachtaí árachais in Éirinn
Its purpose is to answer policyholders' questions and help them resolve problems
Is é an cuspóir atá aici ceisteanna shealbhóirí polasaí a fhreagairt agus cabhrú leo fadhbanna a réiteach
It has no binding powers and complaints that cannot be resolved are generally referred to the Financial Services Ombudsman
Níl aon chumhachtaí cealgaltacha aici agus is iondúil a n-atreoraítear gearáin nach féidir a réiteach chuig Ombudsman um Sheirbhísí Airgeadais
If you have been refused a quotation for motor insurance, you can email the Declined Cases Committee of Insurance Ireland who will help you obtain a motor insurance quotation

Má diúltaíodh meastachán duit le haghaidh árachas mótair, Is féidir leat ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig Choiste na gCásanna Diúltaithe de Éire Árachas a bheidh ag cabhrú leat a fháil meastachán árachas mótair
The Motor Insurers Bureau of Ireland exists to compensate genuine victims of uninsured and untraced driving in Ireland
Tá an Biúró Árachóirí Gluaisteán na hÉireann ann chun cúiteamh a thabhairt d'fhíor-íospartaigh tiomána gan árachas agus gan rianú in Éirinn
It fulfils a further European role to ensure claims arising from foreign motoring in Ireland or Irish motorists abroad are properly handled and settled
